text: You Only Live Twice is a 1967 British spy action thriller movie directed by Lewis Gilbert and is the 5th movie in the James Bond franchise. It stars Sean Connery, Akiko Wakabayashi, Tetsuro Tamba, Mie Hama, Teru Shimada, Karin Dor, Donald Pleasence and was distributed by United Artists. Nancy Sinatra sings the title song of the movie. == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:1960s spy movies Category:1967 action movies Category:1967 thriller movies Category:James Bond movies Category:Movies set in Japan Category:Movies set in Tokyo Category:Movies set underwater Category:Cold War movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Gilbert Category:Movies composed by John Barry
title: You Only Live Twice (movie)
